messages.subject: New Unschooling list
messages.msgSnippet: Just a quick note to let you know that I started a new unschooling list at a place called lilaguide . It s free to join and I d love to see some of you over
messages.messageBody:
Just a quick note to let you know that I started a new unschooling
list at a place called "lilaguide". It's free to join and I'd love to
see some of you over there:
http://www.lilaguide.com/groups/learninginfreedom.aspx

I got an email from them a few weeks ago about starting a group, but
was too busy to respond. It said there was a small referral fee for
every person that joins (which I figure might be a good supplement to
our meager income) but when I started the group it only says that
lilaguide is free...so I'm not really sure how it all works in the end.

I wanted a message board that went along with my website "Learning in
Freedom", so that's the name of the group.:)

Come on over!!

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
